articles.title: About me
articles.contents:
My name is Harald Kliems. I like bikes, cities, health, data, maps.
More information
I’m president of the local bike advocacy non-profit Madison Bikes, I work at the University of Wisconsin School of Medicine and Public Health, I contribute to OpenStreetMap. I’m on the City of Madison Transportation Commission. I have a nerdy and infrequently updated bike blog.
All opinions here are my own.
Contact me
kliems@gmail.com
Follow me on Twitter
https://twitter.com/HaraldKliems
